The trip takes them to the rainforest, a durian plantation and a run-in with a wild boar!

programme.title: Tree Fu Tom S3 - EP 6
programme.desc: A fantasy, action-adventure series which follows the amazing adventures of a young boy, Tom.

programme.title: Pororo The Little Penguin S6 - EP 5
programme.desc: Pororo, the mischievous penguin lives in a village on a far far away island with his unlikely friends. No one knows how they ended up on the island, but they've got to stick together and make the best of it.

programme.title: Hi-5 S17 - EP 17
programme.desc: Iconic children's pop group Hi-5 continues to teach kids about animals, colours, music and more.

programme.title: Hi-5 S17 - EP 18
programme.desc: Iconic children's pop group Hi-5 continues to teach kids about animals, colours, music and more.

programme.title: TOBOT: Galaxy Detectives - EP 29
programme.desc: Long time ago in the universe, there were 6 Galaxy Weapons that could rule the universe. The cosmic villain Demons is trying to rule the universe with the 6 Galaxy Weapons. One day, the space ship carrying the galaxy weapons is chased by Demons' minion and decides to escape to earth!

programme.title: Kody Kapow S1 - EP 8
programme.desc: Kody Kapow is about an aspiring martial arts-style superhero named Kody who spends the summer with his extended family in a small village in China. His grandfather, a martial arts master, teaches Kody ancient lessons of mindfulness, patience and perseverance, which Kody employs as he and his super spy cousin Mei set off on adventures in the village together with their tiger friend Goji.

programme.title: Sonic Boom S2 - EP 11
programme.desc: Sonic, Tails, Amy, Knuckles, and Sticks reside on Seaside Island in Hedgehog Village. Together, they defend the island from various threats like Doctor Eggman and his robotic creation.

programme.title: Marvel's Guardians Of The Galaxy Yr 1 - EP 24
programme.desc: It's up to the Guardians to protect the universe from Thanos, Ronan, Loki and other villains!

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago S5 - Possession - EP 8
programme.desc: A grieving Lloyd is possessed by the ghost of Morro - the Master of Wind and Wu's first student. In Lloyd's body, Morro renders the other ninja powerless before stealing Wu's staff. This relic has the power to open the fabric between realms, enabling the powerful Preeminent to enter the NINJAGO world!

programme.title: Word Whiz Or Slime Pit S2 - EP 5
programme.desc: Dr Slime is back with more slime and a new and improved slime lab! Contestants will have to beat Dr Slime to solving the word puzzles, otherwise they'll get slimed and get stuck in his game forever!

programme.title: On The Red Dot - The Food That Made Me - EP 41
programme.desc: Celebrity host Jacqueline Chow grew up knowing little about her Heng Hua culture and cuisine. But a hunt for her roots uncovers an unusual history of pirates, mushrooms and a goddess. Our food tells us incredible stories of how we lived, fought and survived. Join 5 personalities as they embark on a journey to discover their past through the traditional food that they loved.

programme.title: Funny Girl
programme.desc: The life of Fanny Brice, famed comedienne and entertainer of the early 1900s. We see her rise to fame as a Ziegfeld girl, subsequent career, and her personal life, particularly her relationship with Nick Arnstein.

programme.title: Big Hero 6: The Series Yr 1 - EP 7
programme.desc: Based on Walt Disney Animation Studios Oscar-winning feature film.

programme.title: Power Rangers Ninja Steel - EP 6

programme.title: Transformers Robots In Disguise S4 - EP 19

programme.title: Cardfight!! Vanguard - EP 44
programme.desc: The new season embarks on a new story with Aichi and Kai returning to take up the helm as the main protagonists. Many beloved characters such as Misaki Tokura, Kamui Katsuragi and Ren Suzugamori appear as well.

programme.title: Totally Totto - EP 6
programme.desc: Isaac Ng has never been good in science, and gets bored in class easily. He wishes he could develop a passion for it, just like his scientist father. Little does he know he's about to get what he wished for - in the form of Totto, a genius bunny who takes him on many fun and crazy adventures in science! Totally Totto is a live action series with an adorable puppet and animation-filled segments that brings science to your fingertips.

Be surprised by unexpected stories. Marvel at iconic landscapes. And be awestruck by spectacular wildlife.

programme.desc: (R) Based on Louis Cha's classic swordplay novel, this lavish production stars Taiwanese heartthrob Ma Jing Tao as a legendary swordsman and TCS top actress Fann Wong as his love interest. programme.title: 一切从昏睡开始 While You Were Away - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) A netizen exposes Man Rong's secret of going through plastic surgery and Zi Jun shares that with her talent, she actually does not need surgery to make a mark in society. Man Rong becomes triggered, and tells him that it was his mean comments about her looks that made her decide to go for plastic surgery back then. Zi Jun is taken aback, and he says that he had complimented Man Rong's design talent too, but she had not heard him then. Zi Jun apologizes, and both of them resolve their conflicts. (PG)(重)曼蓉整容的事被网友爆出来，子骏认为以她的实力，根本不用去整容，也能在社会上立足。曼蓉一听火冒三丈，说她是因为子骏当年的毒舌嘲笑才去整容的。子骏愕然，说后来他还称赞曼蓉有设计才华，可是曼蓉没有听到。子骏道歉，两人解开心结。.

programme.desc: Join James, the host with outstanding culinary skills and an appetite for good food, as he explores markets and savours local delicacies. He will also showcase new cooking methods, and eventually present a creative dish. 食当令，吃在地，才能吃到最新鲜、最在地的「限定版美食料理」！你有听说过一年只产40天的茭白笋吗？即使不经过烹调，只是生吃，它夸张的甜度都让詹姆士大呼惊奇！而且你能想像这甜到爆表的茭白笋竟然是用温泉水灌溉的吗？宜兰的知名在地料理：宜兰羹、炸肝花、炸鸡卷…为什么让人吃了还想再吃？詹姆士带大家一窥其中祕诀！.

programme.desc: (R) Zi Jun shows Man Rong the suggestive messages that Ian had sent to Sen Mei, but Man Rong tells him that a text message alone cannot prove that Sen Mei has had an affair. Man Rong says that she is also at fault because she had spoken badly of him whenever Sen Mei shared her sorrows with her, adding fuel to fire. Zi Jun and Man Rong get drunk and lose their consciousness, and are about to kiss each other... (PG-性相关语)(重)子骏将Ian发给森美的暧昧简讯给曼蓉看，曼蓉认为凭一个简讯不能断定森美出轨。子骏自责，说一切是因自己冷落了森美所造成。曼蓉说自己也有责任，在森美向她诉苦的时候，她还加油加酱地说子骏的坏话。子骏和曼蓉酒后意乱情迷，眼看就要接吻……。.

programme.title: 甘味人生 Taste Of Life - EP 388
programme.desc: hu-Tsai, Chao and his wife have five children. Because of their father's invention dream, the Chao brother's lives are about to change. (PG)赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 一切从昏睡开始 While You Were Away - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) Sen Mei wakes up, but she has lost some of her memories, and cannot remember what had led to the car accident. Zi Jun remembers kissing Man Rong, and he avoids her because he feels guilty. Man Rong reassures him and says that they had not kissed that night. Man Rong knows that Zi Jun still loves Sen Mei, and feels dejected. (PG)(重)森美醒来，但出现局部失忆的状况，忘记了一些与车祸有关的事情。子骏想起和曼蓉接吻的事，心中有愧，开始逃避曼蓉。曼蓉告诉子骏，当晚他们其实没有接吻，子骏如释重负。曼蓉发现子骏爱的始终是森美，感到黯然。.

Challengers must avoid last place on their first week in addition to finishing in top four on the second week (in a combination of both knockout and challenge rounds) to be declared safe; failing either challenge instantly eliminates the singer from the competition. 《歌手2018》与往季竞演结束后统一投票的操作方式有所不同，本季光临现场的大众听审们有两次机会行使投票权力，而新增的这一次机会是“预投票”环节。“预投票”环节，是指500位大众听审在前四位出场歌手中选择一名进行一轮“预投票”。该节目的首发歌手为汪峰、Jessie J、李圣杰、张韶涵、GAI、张天、李晓东；补位歌手为李泉、华晨宇、腾格尔、郁可唯；踢馆歌手为苏诗丁、KZ·谭定安、霍尊，由张韶涵担任该节目的首位女性音乐串讲人。.

programme.title: 旅游陷阱 Holiday Gone Wrong - EP 2
programme.desc: Holiday Gone Wrong brings viewers through the stories of eight overseas holidays which had gone awry. Through re-enactments and interviews, victims share compelling first-hand accounts of their ordeals - of either being kidnapped, robbed, or scammed of their money and belongings. At the end of each episode, relevant spokespersons will share with viewers various precautionary measures one could take when caught in similar situations. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/英)《旅游陷阱》将通过搬演片段为观众带来惊险旅游故事。受害者也会献身讲述当时的恐怖经历，其中将包括在途中被绑架，打抢及诈骗等。到节目的尾声，专家也会向观众分享如何在遇到类似情况时，采取好防护措施。.

programme.title: 地球的孤儿 Orphans of the Earth - EP 8
programme.desc: The host and the filming team travel across the world's seven continents to bring close-up scenes of endangered species'survival difficulties to the audience. 主持人和拍摄团队走遍世界七大洲实地取景, 让观众近距离观察濒危物种的生存困境。.

programme.title: 进击的台湾 Hello Taiwan - EP 6
programme.desc: This programme introduces to viewers Taiwan's traditional cuisine and its unique ingredient and spices.

programme.title: 新生之旅 Rites of Motherhood - EP 2
programme.desc: Taiwan is a land of contradictions, even the celebrations of motherhood offer an interesting mix of old and new. Here, Charlyn checks out the whimsical Hello Kitty Maternity Hospital as well as an ancient Taoist shrine for a Taiwanese mummy's experience! 《新生之旅》这一集随着翠芳带你来到了台湾，一个同时具有传统和现代面向的宝岛。除了了解台湾朋友们迎接新生命的传统礼俗以外，也看看他们如何以现代化的新思维，融合并且保留了传统的新生礼俗。.

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 63
programme.desc: Ep 63: Wu Chun picks up a toy ring near the fishing pond. Taihao recognizes the ring immediately and suspects that Yalan is behind Teacher Jin's disappearance. Ep 63: 吴春在金老师去过的钓鱼区捡到一枚玩具戒指。泰浩一看到戒指就认出那是他送给雅兰的定情信物，于是怀疑雅兰跟金老师的失踪案有关。.

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 64
programme.desc: Ep 64: Yalan was seen quarrelling with Teacher Jin on the day of his disappearance. Taihao is even surer that Yalan is hiding something from everyone. Yalan admits to Taihao that she has caused Teacher Jin's death. Wu Chun overhears their conversation. Ep 64: 有人目睹雅兰曾经在金老师失踪那天在钓鱼区与金老师吵架。泰浩越来越确定雅兰有事隐瞒，于是质问雅兰。雅兰直说她害死了金老师。两人的对话被吴春听到。.

programme.title: 云画的月光 Love In The Moonlight - EP 9
programme.desc: Lewen runs into eunuch Zheng who is leaving the palace. She gives him her blessing while Zheng reminds her to pay attention to people around her as he has long observed that the crown prince and Jin Yinsheng have both taken a liking to Lewen. Li Ying gets appointed to chair a session of court assembly. However, when he arrives at the court, all the ministers are absent on false sick leave. 乐温碰到背着行李正准备离开的张内官时，祝福他。张内官提醒乐温要她留意身边人，因他早已看出世子和金胤圣都钟意乐温，但却未明说。李旲受命代理听政，来到朝庭却发现大臣均假装有病，无人上朝。.

programme.title: 云画的月光 Love In The Moonlight - EP 10
programme.desc: Lewen brings Li Ying desserts. The moody Li Ying cheers up because of Lewen and thinks of a solution for the the officials staying away from court. He sends a medicine cart to the house of Jin which brings shame to the ministers. Xiayan and Yinsheng meet up and plan to think of a way to void their arranged marriage as each already have a sweetheart. 乐温给李旲端来甜品，本来心情不佳的李旲因乐温而愉快起来，并想到了解决群臣不来上朝的问题的办法。他带了一车药来到金府，让群臣们自觉尴尬。霞妍与胤圣见面，因俩人都各有心上人，于是打算共同想办法取消婚约。.

programme.title: 百变达人 Beyond Show - EP 11
programme.desc: An entertaining talent competition with participants from Japan, Italy, China etc. The judges are Wilber Pan, Patty Hou, Li Bo and Liu Yan. 《百变达人》集结了导播、灯光、舞美、视觉、置景、秀导团队，百人共创。以独特的创意呈现，将不同的表演形式，通过创意的、科技的、艺术的加工。.

programme.title: 天生一对 Love Destiny - EP 37
programme.desc: Det and Ketsurang get married. Det's elder brother, who is in exile, comes home secretly to pay respect to his late father. 德特和佳苏兰顺利完成婚礼。流放外地的德特兄长偷偷回家祭拜亡父。.

programme.title: 天生一对 Love Destiny - EP 38
programme.desc: Phetracha attempts to convince Kosa Pan to join hands and fight against Phaulkon. Ketsurang pleads with Phetracha to have mercy on Phaulkon's wife and children. 帕碧罗阇尝试说服歌莎班，与他联手对付华尔康。佳苏兰恳求帕碧罗阇放过华尔康的家眷。.

programme.title: News Tonight - EP 44
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day. U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

programme.title: 被告人 Innocent Defendant - EP 16
programme.desc: Ep 19 - Zhengyu set a trap for Shanhao and demanded him to release Xiayan, in return for his son's safety. Zhengyu and Xiayan finally reunited. Junhe was shocked when Zhengyu appeared with Xiayan at the police station to turn himself in.Ep 20 - Shanhao pleaded with his father to help after he realised his crimes would soon be exposed. Unable to nail Shanhao, Chengkui turned himself in to help Zhengyu, but Cheng was later murdered. Ep 19 - 政宇设计要善浩交出夏燕否则会伤害他儿子。政宇与夏燕终于团聚。政宇突然带着夏燕向警方自首，让俊赫不知所措。Ep 20 - 善浩知道自己的罪行将揭发，急忙向父亲求助。无法定善浩的罪行，成奎舍身向警方自首想救政宇，不料却被杀了灭口。.

programme.title: 被告人 Innocent Defendant - EP 16
programme.desc: Ep 19 - Zhengyu set a trap for Shanhao and demanded him to release Xiayan, in return for his son's safety. Zhengyu and Xiayan finally reunited. Junhe was shocked when Zhengyu appeared with Xiayan at the police station to turn himself in.Ep 20 - Shanhao pleaded with his father to help after he realised his crimes would soon be exposed. Ep 19 - 政宇设计要善浩交出夏燕否则会伤害他儿子。政宇与夏燕终于团聚。政宇突然带着夏燕向警方自首，让俊赫不知所措。Ep 20 - 善浩知道自己的罪行将揭发，急忙向父亲求助。无法定善浩的罪行，成奎舍身向警方自首想救政宇，不料却被杀了灭口。.

programme.desc: Cleaning made easy with a cordless, lightweight & versatile vacuum! 无重量、无麻烦、无电线吸尘机，让你省时省事省力气！.

programme.title: 好货驾到 Deals For Joy - EP 6
programme.desc: Experience with our hosts how you can make cleaning easier than before with this extraordinary vacuum. 要让家居一尘不染那就得靠这位好帮手——吸尘器！.

programme.desc: Is there really a tumbler that can maintain the temperature of your hot and cold drinks for a long time? Find out how amazing this tumbler is. 真的有长效保冷以及储热的杯子吗？一起看看它有多神奇。.

programme.title: 好货驾到 Deals For Joy - EP 17
programme.desc: Incorporate this green diet smoothie into your meals. 来一杯助你维持健康的蔬果饮料吧!

programme.desc: A durable non-stick frying pan is a kitchen must-have! 日本技术Evercook锅组 - 用不粘锅具组做无油料理，为你的健康加分！.

programme.title: 好货驾到 Deals For Joy - EP 28
programme.desc: Mopping your floor will no longer be a chore if you have the right mop! Ultimo神奇双用拖把 - 能湿用能干用的神奇拖把，让你清理家居事半功倍！.

programme.title: 嗨唱起来 Hey, Let's Sing! - EP 9
programme.desc: A new music programme that turns the stage into a huge karaoke session. In each session, 3 contestants will be selected to sing with the guest performers. Guest performers include Fei Yuqing, Gem, Jam Hsiao, Li Rong Hao, Jeff Chang etc. 《嗨唱起来》，大型全民嗨唱互动音乐综艺秀，节目定位全民嗨唱、最强互动、星素结合、甄选新秀通过素人歌手对层层关卡的挑战，孵化素人“歌神”。星素合唱，推进“全民共唱”概念，实现场内外投票竞猜外同步共唱，线上线下无缝连接。.

programme.title: 搜密新加坡 Secret Singapore Sr 2 - EP 12
programme.desc: Secret Singapore is an investigative-style travelogue, where our roving detective-host digs for clues, and snoops for hush-hush places and people here. Our host will go knee-deep in mud, track through jungles, creep through barbed wire fences, just to give you that exclusive access. (重)(双声道-中/英)搜密新加坡第二系列节目带你穿街走巷寻访被遗忘的历史、私密的隐匿处、有趣的人物和另类工作，给你满满的惊喜！追随主持人的脚步踏上任务之旅，一起破解谜团、搜寻不为人知的地点、走访有趣故事的人物及探索本地让人咋舌的事项。.

programme.title: 食在有价值 For Food's Sake! - EP 3
programme.desc: Who can go without fragrant Thai jasmine rice?In the last episode, Lennard traces how politics and extreme weather are driving up prices of these beloved staples. 主持人到东南亚各地查看国际大事如环境污染及定价丑闻对食物价格的影响，让聪明的消费者对盘中物的价格有更深的了解。.

programme.title: 美食大翻新 Foodie Makeover - EP 1
programme.desc: There are many famous food bloggers locally. The first one to accept the challenge is Daniel@Daniel Food Diary! The food that he wants to give a makeover is the "mala hotpot" which is popular among local youngsters recently! In order to have a successful makeover, Daniel has also enlisted the help of a professional chef! Can blogger Daniel, who only eats and doesn't cook, succeed in creating a new dish? Will his food-tasters like it? 本地有多位著名的美食博客，首集接受挑战的是Daniel（@Daniel Food Diary）！他想翻新的美食是近年来本地年轻人爱吃的“麻辣香锅"！为了“翻新"美食成功，他找来了一位大厨和他一起研发。到底只会吃不会下厨的Daniel，第一次试验新美食会成功吗？食客会喜欢吗？.

programme.title: 绕着地球跑 Run To The World - EP 7
programme.desc: This travelogue brings viewers to exotic places of ultimate experience and showcase places of interest and culture. Countries covered are Russia, Uzbekistan and Kazakhstan, etc. In this episode, the host will bring viewers to tour Vladivostok. 这系列的旅游节目将带观众到异国风情的地方，享受终极的体验，参观名胜古迹。 覆盖的国家是俄罗斯，乌兹别克斯坦，哈萨克斯坦等。在这一集，主持人将带观众游览海参崴。.

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 65
programme.desc: Ep 65: Teacher Jin appears at the office suddenly to Yalan's astonishment. Yalan admits to her wrong-doings and apologises to Teacher Jin profusely. Juxi is shocked to realise that Yalan has framed Teacher Jin previously. Ep 65: 金老师突然出现在公司里，令雅兰吓一跳。金老师指雅兰把他当成死人，然后把添加剂事件算在他头上。雅兰承认错误，拼命向金老师道歉，两人的对话被菊熙听到。菊熙跪地求金老师原谅自己没有教好雅兰。.

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 66
programme.desc: Ep 66: Meida finds out that Yonghao had died while trying to save Xianshu previously. She even discovers that Malu and Wu Chun decided to get together even though they knew about the truth long ago. Meida is unable to bring herself to approve of their decision. Ep 66: 美达发现永浩当初是为了要救贤淑才过世的，后来还发现其实马陆和吴春早就知道真相还执意要在一起，觉得他们很不应该。.

programme.title: 云画的月光 Love In The Moonlight - EP 11
programme.desc: Princess Yongwen decides to step out of her gloom after hearing what Lewen said. She goes to the cabinet which she hid in three years ago when playing hide-and-seek. She recalls witnessing the prime minister Jinxian bringing his men and murdering the palace maid who knew the truth of the queen's death. 咏温翁主听过乐温的一番话之后，想要尝试走出自己的心门。她来到自己三年前玩捉迷藏时藏的柜子前，想起当年躲在柜子里亲眼看到金宪领相带着人，在这里杀了知道中殿娘娘冤死真相的侍女。.

programme.title: 云画的月光 Love In The Moonlight - EP 12
programme.desc: The Emperor decides to arrange a marriage for Li Ying in order to stabilise the political situation after much deliberation. He secretly summons Minister Zhao Wanheng to the palace and wants Zhao Xiayan to marry the crown prince. Zheng Dehao tops the imperial exams and gets summoned by Li Ying. In the palace, he runs into Lewen who wrote the lover letter on his behalf. Both pretend not to know each other as they do not want to expose the identity of Zheng Dehao. 皇上为了收复涣散的民心，稳定政局，再三思索，决定为李旲举行国婚。他密诏礼判赵万衡进宫，想让赵霞妍做世子嫔。郑德浩公子因科举考试中了状元被李旲召来，不料在宫里遇到了代写情书的乐温。两人都不想让郑德浩公子的身份暴露，便假装不认识。.

programme.title: 声入人心 Super Vocal - EP 4
programme.desc: "Super Vocal" is a singing competition focused on classically trained singers, singing both operatic and musical pieces. It features 36 male singers, with six winners after a total of 100 days. The panel of judges include renowned opera singer Liao Chang Yong, Shang Wen Jie and Henry Lau. 节目由舞台公演和真人秀两部分组成，由3位出品人在100天内对36位演唱成员进行分组打磨、陪伴成长，最终选出6位首席演唱者获得美声音乐会全国巡演和发行音乐专辑的机会。.

programme.title: 天生一对 Love Destiny - EP 39
programme.desc: Mali fails to persuade Phaulkon to give up his plans. Ketsurang gives birth to a pair of twins. 茉莉苦劝华尔康回头，但华尔康一意孤行。佳苏兰初为人母，顺利产下双胞胎。.

programme.title: 天生一对 Love Destiny - EP 40
programme.desc: Ketsurang reveals to Det and Kosa Pan that she came from the future. Det and Kosa Pan are astonished. 佳苏兰跟德特和歌莎班坦诚自己不是这个时代的人。德特和歌莎班深感惊讶。.

programme.desc: Tom Tom Bak was one of the entertaining kids variety show in the past years on Astro Ceria. It will return this year with Datuk Aznin Hj Nawawi or better known as Pak Nil as the host. The shwo will cast children between 2 years to 16 years old showing their talents and skills.

programme.title: Ayuh Sihat Bersama S4 - EP 1
programme.desc: Host: Shahril WahidLet's work out even when we are home alone! The sport experts will share exercise tips and routine by providing step by step tutorial.

programme.desc: Hanan meets Hani and Qalish at a shopping mall without Nawal. Upon returning home, Nawal receives an earful from Masitah for allowing Hanan to meet his ex-wife. Meanwhile, Nafisah meets Megat for the first time when he saves her during a robbery attempt.

programme.title: Hey Mr Spotlight - EP 7
programme.desc: When her school results deteriorate, Hazri becomes worried and decided to get his good friend Azraf to be his sister Raisya's tuition teacher. Reluctantly, he agreed to the offer but Raisya was against it. They had a rough journey together when Raisya's prone to arguing with Azraf which always leads him to lose his patience. Though frequently disagreeing with each other, unknowingly, Azraf has secretly set his eyes on Raisya without her realising it. Raisya is disturbed by her mother's plan to match make her with her good friend's son Hans.She refused to marry him, a guy she does not know. Her mother gave her a choice to marry Hans or bring a boyfriend of her choice.To save her, she then decides to bring Azraf to see her mother.

programme.title: Mamaku Bibikku
programme.desc: A story of the challenges of a deaf mother, Mariana raising her hearing child, Nelly that interweaves with the life of a domestic helper, Asih who is a motherly figure to Nelly as well. Mariana has to divide her time between taking care of her aged mother-in-law, as well as taking care of Nelly and decides to employ a helper Asih. She works with the family for more than ten years and Mariana's jealousy of Asih has grown during Nelly's teenage years.

programme.title: Isteri Dalam Sangkar - EP 1
programme.desc: Isteri dalam Sangkar is a modern twist Cinderella love story. Aisyah is left to take care of her aunt and cousins after her parents' death. Her aunt, Mak Su treats her like a slave in her own house. Tengku Iskandar is born into a rich family and has everything going well in his life. One day, he goes on a holiday in Genting Highlands and meets Aisyah. He is then forced to marry her to protect his family's integrity. Will Aisyah finally receive the happiness that she has been longing for? Siti Aisyah lives with her aunt and cousins after her parents' death. Her best friend, Ros advises her to leave the house quickly after noticing bruises on her. Tengku Iskandar receives a warning from his father that if he refuses to change to become a better person, he will not be able to take over TG Holdings.

programme.title: My Coffee Prince - EP 23
programme.desc: Adapted from Korea's most popular drama series, Coffee Prince tell the story of four young people who meet together at a cafe as they navigate through love, life and their dreams.Raikal is a smart young man who hates the idea of being tied down to one career. Reluctant to join the family business, he is ordered by his grandmother to manage a cafe. Though reluctant to run the cafe, he slowly begins to immerse himself in the gourmet coffee business. The trust that Raikal had with Dani has faded when he finds out the truth about her.He is confused and in a dilemma about his feeling towards Dani. To forget her, he decides to fire Dani from his café.

programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. Anakku Duniaku is a telemovie depicting three stories portraying facets of motherhood within the facets of Singapore lifestyle. All 3 stories evolve and intersect at the Social Service Centre as a common meeting ground. Through this common ground of social service, the characters regardless of their social status discover their strengths and weaknesses to stand together to overcome their adversities. In its resolve, the mothers find a solution for their adversities through their strong motherly instinct.

programme.title: Hey Mr Spotlight - EP 11
programme.desc: When her school results deteriorate, Hazri becomes worried and decided to get his good friend Azraf to be his sister Raisya's tuition teacher. Reluctantly, he agreed to the offer but Raisya was against it. They had a rough journey together when Raisya's prone to arguing with Azraf which always leads him to lose his patience. Though frequently disagreeing with each other, unknowingly, Azraf has secretly set his eyes on Raisya without her realising it. When Azraf and Raisya decide to bring forward their wedding date, both parents disagree with their idea. programme.title: Ingat Tak,Mak?
programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. Ingat Tak, Mak? is about a mother's sacrifice at the expense of being misunderstood and hated by her only daughter all her life. Abused and ill-treated by her alcoholic and gambling addict husband, Habibah leaves home with her young daughter, to spare her of an abusive father and to give her a chance to break out of their poverty-stricken lives. Alone with no money, she struggles to raise her daughter until she meets her second husband who rescues the family.

programme.title: Isteri Dalam Sangkar - EP 5
programme.desc: Aisyah and Iskandar are caught for close proximity. Iskandar has no other choice but to marry Aisyah to avoid smearing his family's name. Her best friend, Ros advises her to leave the house quickly after noticing bruises on her. programme.title: Bantal Buruk Saloma - EP 5
programme.desc: BANTAL BURUK SALOMA is a social drama about foster parenting that centres around family, life, love and forming relationships that lasts a lifetime. But it comes with serious challenges, especially when Aidilfitri approaches. Aidilfitri is a happy time for most kids. But for kids in orphanage or foster care, it is not easy. Some miss their parents. Lutfi is getting treatment but he could not be saved. Soon, Lutfi passes on and leaves Zaid and Rahmah utterly distraught. Zaid blames himself and becomes a changed man, leaving Rahmah and the kids baffled by his new behaviour. Meanwhile, Rafi and Suraya start to argue as to whether they should let Saloma meet with her mother since they are worried she might find out about Saloma's mother's condition. This leads to them falling out when Suraya insists Saloma should visit her mom. Saloma brings her ‘Bantal Buruk Saloma’ for her mom. Saloma’s mother thanks Suraya and Rafi for taking such good care of Saloma. Just as Saloma is connecting with her mom, Saloma’s mom passes away, leaving Saloma broken and distraught….

He decided to adopt her after she cannot remember her family. Unfortunately, Sofiya has a life-threatening illness. Alysa is surprised to know she is going to be engaged with Tashriq that day. Kamil has secretly peep into Khadijah’s house and see their happiness from far. He regrets his mistakes and has come back with his wife whom he neglected. Meanwhile Arif meets Della whom he believes shared the same revenge as him. This is after Arif sees Della following Tashriq’s car. Both plan to ruin Alysa and Tashriq relationship.

programme.title: Hak Siapa - EP 2
programme.desc: Syariah law in Singapore today helps to resolve cases, covering different aspects of marriage, divorces, ancillary matters, custody and inheritance for the Muslim community. However, many will instead relate the Syariah law and court as messy, complex, complicated and emotionally draining; a long and tedious process that may impact the children. And because the issues discussed are sensitive, many tend to shy away from sharing their understanding or misunderstanding of the court and its process. Razak was supportive at first when Murni started to go back to work. He became jealous when Murni got reconnected with her friends, and soon became hooked on social media. After 1 year in Kuala Lumpur, Luqman returns to his village announcing that he is now a qualified pilot. Zia is happy of his achievement and cannot wait to marry him. programme.desc: Bersama hos Fariha Razak menyelami latihan-latihan yang dilaksanakan oleh atlet-atlet berprestasi tinggi dalam meningkatkan prestasi mereka.

programme.title: Rencah Hidup
programme.desc: Rencah Hidup membawakan kisah keinsafan dari insan-insan yang pernah melakukan kesalahan. Episod ini memaparkan kisah insan yang terlibat dengan Jenayah Perjudian.

programme.desc: Hijau Dot Com episod kali ini menampilkan produk-produk dari sisa kumbahan.

programme.title: Al Mulki Nusantara
programme.desc: Al-Mulki Nusantara episod ini menceritakan tentang Perkembangan Islam di Perlak.

programme.title: Doktor Pokok
programme.desc: Doktor Pokok adalah sebuah rancangan yang bertemakan Kenali Penyakit Pelihara Tanaman yang dihoskan oleh Heliza Helmi. Episod kali ini membawakan anda dengan lebih dekat mengenai rumpai dan khasiatnya.

programme.title: Cina Muslim Malaysia
programme.desc: Dihoskan oleh Iswan Ismail, episod kali ini menceritakan mengenai perayaan dan tradisi Cina Muslim bersama Profesor Dr. Taufiq Yap (Presiden Persatuan Cina Muslim Malaysia), Nazri NG (Timbalan Pengerusi Persatuan Cina Muslim Perak) dan Rosmina Johari.

programme.title: Psikosis
programme.desc: Psikosis adalah sebuah rancangan yang memaparkan kisah-kisah, pengalaman dan rawatan tentang pelbagai penyakit mental bersama hos Aiman Amri. Psikosis pada minggu ini memaparkan kisah pejuang Bipolar Disorder.

programme.title: Langit Borneo
programme.desc: Mengembara dan menerokai Pulau Borneo serta melihat Borneo dalam kepelbagaian alam semulajadi Pantai & Pulau seperti Pantai Tanjung Lobang Miri, Pantai Kura-Kura Sikawang, Pantai Tusan, Tunku Abdul Rahman National Park Kota Kinabalu, Pantai Rang Bulan Kota Belud dan Pantai Tanjung Batu Bintulu. Lokasi ini sangat menarik dan sesuai untuk dilawati serta menjadi tarikan pelancong.

programme.title: Sky News
programme.desc: All the day's news from Sky News correspondents around the world.

programme.title: Work and play
programme.desc: Scotty James rides the incredible backcountry of Japan’s best mountains. Scotty James rides the incredible backcountry of Japan’s best mountains and gains insight into the people, food and culture of one of the world’s greatest snowboarding locations.

programme.title: The bottom line
programme.desc: Pecky arrives in Los Angeles for the biggest meeting of his life – with Scotty James's sponsors. Pecky arrives in Los Angeles for the biggest meeting of his life. Scotty James shows him the sights at Robbie Maddison’s house, but it’s clear that the anxiety of meeting SJ’s sponsors is distracting.

programme.title: In the Balance
programme.desc: Trials rider and viral video star Danny MacAskill fights injuries to make his most ambitious film project. Trials rider and viral video star Danny MacAskill heads to Newport Beach, California to create the film project of his dreams, but old injuries in his back and knee keep limiting him on the bike. He's hoping rehab training in the gym will help.

programme.title: Taking Shape
programme.desc: Danny MacAskill starts a perfomance programme with his rehab trainer, first in the gym, then on his bike. As he recovers from major back surgery, cyclist Danny MacAskill films a TV documentary about action sports athletes with one of his heroes, Guy Martin. Then work of rehab begins as he starts to plan his moves for the film project.

programme.title: Kickstarted
programme.desc: Crowdfunding can help ordinary people achieve their dreams, but running a Kickstarter can be a full-time job. A Kickstarter campaign can be a way for artists and inventors to achieve lifelong dreams, but running a successful Kickstarter is more than just pushing a button and collecting money – it’s both a full-time job and an art all unto itself.

programme.title: Back to Life
programme.desc: Torin Yater-Wallace sets out to be the world’s greatest freeskier, but his family life takes a harsh turn. Torin Yater-Wallace sets out to be the world’s greatest competitive freeskier, but is thrown off course by his father’s imprisonment, his mother’s cancer diagnosis and his own deadly liver infection. Can he reach his dreams despite these struggles?

programme.title: Meet the Air Force
programme.desc: The Red Bull Air Force suit up at the Flying Crown Ranch for four days of intensive airborne training. Miles Daisher, Jon Devore, and the rest of the Red Bull Air Force suit up at the Flying Crown Ranch to push the limits of human flight, while Kirby Chambliss and his Zivko Edge 540 aerobatic plane pierce through a 12-man wingsuit formation.

programme.title: Buzzing the Apple
programme.desc: The Red Bull Air Force makes a daring wingsuit flight over Manhattan before landing on a barge in the Hudson. The Red Bull Air Force plans a daring wingsuit flight over the iconic Manhattan skyline, soaring at speeds of up to 193 kph and rubbing elbows with skyscrapers before attempting to land on a barge in the Hudson River.

programme.title: Conquering the Storm: el documental de Cape Fear
programme.desc: La ola más brutal de Australia y el evento más increíble del mundo. El Red Bull Cape Fear es uno de los eventos de surf de olas grandes más heavies de todo el mundo. Con unas condiciones de lo más extremas (un tubo endiablado, un acantilado enfrente y un afilado y poco profundo fondo de roca), Cape Fear se ha ganado el interés de los mejores y más valientes surfers del planeta. ¡Éste es el documental que lo relata!

programme.title: Scaling it up
programme.desc: Mike puts his new-found co-driving skills to the test in a real rally set-up. Will his hard work pay off? Mike goes into a real rally set-up with Elfyn Evans to put his co-driving lessons into practice. Will his hard work pay off or will his new-found skills desert him in the ever-changing conditions of high-speed racing?

programme.title: Putting it all together
programme.desc: B-Girl AT is at Red Bull BC One in Zurich and using the skills she’s learned in her journey of discovery. B-Girl AT consolidates everything she’s learned in her 100-day global journey to put on her best performance at Red Bull BC One in Zurich.

programme.title: In the driver's seat
programme.desc: When Mike takes a WRC car out for a test drive Elfyn Evans gives him a helping hand. Mike gets to drive a WRC car with a reluctant Elfyn Evans as co-driver. What could possibly go wrong? Elfyn gives some invaluable help that makes things go a lot more smoothly than they might otherwise have, and Mike has a brilliant time.

programme.title: Alptopia
programme.desc: The more skier Markus Eder has travelled, the more he saw the treasure that hides in the Alps. After travelling the world for the past six years, skier Markus Eder has gained a lot of experience, learning from the professional skiers he skied with. But the more he travelled, the more he saw the treasure that hides in the Alps in Europe.

programme.title: Amazon High Tide
programme.desc: Ramón Navarro is a surfer brave enough to cross the Amazon jungle and find a secret wave spot. Big wave surfer Ramón Navarro is determined enough to cross the remote Amazon jungle in Brazil in search of a secret wave spot.

programme.title: Ultimate MTB House
programme.desc: In the woods of British Columbia, Canada, Brandon and his friends live in a freeride mountain biking paradise. In the woods of Canada’s British Columbia, Brandon Semenuk and his friends move into a cabin and turn the area into their riding playground. With a backyard decked out with dirt jumps and slopestyle courses, its a freeride mountain biking paradise.

programme.title: California Coasting
programme.desc: Brandon Semenuk and Logan Peat drive down the coast in a Ford Mustang Mach 1 for an MTB session in California. To escape the winter in Canada’s British Columbia, Brandon Semenuk and MTB pal Logan Peat hop into a Ford Mustang Mach 1 to road trip down the Pacific coast for an epic mountain bike session in Santa Cruz, California, USA.

programme.title: Perfect Space
programme.desc: Cyclist Danny MacAskill carries the Olympic Torch in Glasgow, Scotland, and searches for a film location. It's a once-in-a-lifetime honour for Danny MacAskill as he rides the Olympic Torch through the packed streets of Glasgow, Scotland. Work of his film project goes on with the search for a location yielding a surprisingly perfect space.

programme.title: Time to Ride
programme.desc: Pressure mounts for Danny as he prepares for the big shoot with ambitious new tricks and a custom built set. In the six months leading up to the film shoot, Danny rides almost every day in the space, though it's still under construction by the ever-growing team. It's the biggest creative and physical challenge of his life, but he's energized to take it on.

programme.title: Fuse
programme.sub-title: The History of Belgium's Premier Techno Club
programme.desc: At Fuse, a nightclub in Brussels, Belgium, everyone has the same unwritten purpose: enjoying techno music. Fuse is a nightclub in Brussels, Belgium where people can indulge their passion for techno freely, without having to think about the way they behave, dress or dance. Everyone in there has the same unwritten purpose: enjoying the music.

programme.title: Going In
programme.sub-title: An up-close look at Trek’s MTB athletes
